enabling_node_inclusion: Kuyang'anira ma nodi ophatikiza, chonde dikirani...
enabling_node_exclusion: Kuyatsa ma node opatula, chonde dikirani...
inclusion_message: Dinani batani pa chipangizo chomwe mukufuna kuwonjezera pa netiweki iyi.
exclusion_message: Dinani batani pa chipangizo chomwe mukufuna kuchotsa pa netiweki iyi.
task_duration_notice: Ntchitoyi ikhoza kutenga masekondi {{timeout}} kuti ithe.
adding_node: Mukuwonjezera {{node}} ya chipangizo , chonde dikirani...
removing_node: Kuchotsa {{node}} ya chipangizo , chonde dikirani...
association_description: Zipangizozi zimatumiza malipoti ku ma node omwe ali m'magulu amagulu. Kuti mulandire malipoti kuchokera ku chipangizochi, phatikizani node 1 (wowongolera) m'magulu agulu.
generic_parameter_description: Lowetsani nambala yokhazikitsira nambala ndi mtengo woti muyike.
